display_long_description:
FREE vertical slice demo of Shotwood. Smash deadly wooden targets with realistic firearms & explosives while you try to escape from this ominous, ridiculous, mysterious facility. Shotwood is the casual (yet satisfyingly tactical) shoot-house themed game!

[media]

# Demo Features

Check out the awesome Shotwood gunplay with immediate access to some high end weaponry, plus the full practice range and 2 **shoot-house assessments**. Chill out in the home environment. Earn credits by completing runs and challenges, hunting the hidden cash wads, or mastering the ridiculous **Balloon Stabber** minigame. Spend credits on ammo, grenades, and gear - including the awesome **sidearm camera**. Find all the hidden clues to access a **secret demo area**!

[media]

# Full Game Features

The full Shotwood experience (not in demo) includes 8 shoot-house assessments with 15 challenges each and 3 modes, 20+ firearms, 9 tactical tools including **kamikaze drones** and the augmented visor, 2 minigame floors, playable arcade cabinet, facility induction process, **progression system**, working grievance booth, big secret area "beyond the booth", more **story** to uncover including 120 random announcements, 4 save slots, various difficulty options including **permadeath**, new game plus, and even more!

[media]

# Tech Features

Shotwood runs at a **smooth 90hz refresh rate**, supports full room scale movement as well as seated play, and offers multiple options for movement, haptics, captions, and whole lot more.

Grab this **FREE** demo right now and... SHOOT SOME WOOD!
